  • Konstruktordetails

  • Methodendetails

    • addCard

      @PostMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CardDto> addCard(@RequestBody CardDto cardDto)
      This endpoint is used to add a card. It maps the incoming cardDto to a card and calls the cardService to add the card.
      Parameter:
      cardDto - the cardDto to add
      Gibt zurück:
      the added cardDto

    • updateCard

      @PutMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CardDto> updateCard(@RequestBody CardDto cardDto)
      This endpoint is used to update a card. It maps the incoming cardDto to a card and calls the cardService to update the card.
      Parameter:
      cardDto - the cardDto to update
      Gibt zurück:
      the updated cardDto

    • getCardsByCategory

      @GetMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<CardDto>> getCardsByCategory(@RequestParam long categoryId)
      This endpoint is used to get all cards of a category. It maps the incoming categoryId to a category and calls the cardService to get all cards of the category.
      Parameter:
      categoryId - the id of the category
      Gibt zurück:
      the list of cardDtos

    • deleteCard

      @DeleteMapping("/") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.http.HttpStatus> deleteCard(@RequestParam long cardId)
      This endpoint is used to delete a specific card by id, throws exception if card not exists.
      Parameter:
      cardId - the id of the category
